telephonenumber.description: List of telephone numbers assigned to the user. If an empty list is passed all assigned telephone numbers will be deleted. If None is passed telephone numbers will not be checked or changed.

sshpubkey.description: List of public SSH key. If an empty list is passed all assigned public keys will be deleted. If None is passed SSH public keys will not be checked or changed.

ipa_port.description: P o r t   o f   I P A   s e r v e r

displayname.description: D i s p l a y   n a m e

uid.description: u i d   o f   t h e   u s e r

loginshell.description: L o g i n   s h e l l

ipa_prot.description: P r o t o c o l   u s e d   b y   I P A   s e r v e r

state.description: S t a t e   t o   e n s u r e

ipa_host.description: I P   o r   h o s t n a m e   o f   I P A   s e r v e r

ipa_user.description: A d m i n i s t r a t i v e   a c c o u n t   u s e d   o n   I P A   s e r v e r

ipa_pass.description: P a s s w o r d   o f   a d m i n i s t r a t i v e   u s e r

mail.description: List of mail addresses assigned to the user. If an empty list is passed all assigned email addresses will be deleted. If None is passed email addresses will not be checked or changed.

givenname.description: F i r s t   n a m e

validate_certs.description: This only applies if C(ipa_prot) is I(https). If set to C(no), the SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only set to C(no) used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.

sn.description: S u r n a m e
